content: Is there a common pattern existing on how Smart on FHIR apps gets authentication for external data sources?

Not really; "external" is the key word here, indicating circumstances beyond what we can standardize. But I suppose the core options are:

  1. App uses SSO (OpenID Connect) data from SMART App Launch (fhirUser practitioner details) to decide what external data to show
  2. App asks user to authenticate separately into an external system before showing any data
